articles.title: Biden to give Presidential Medal of Freedom to Ledecky, Thorpe - ESPN
articles.description: Katie Ledecky, the most decorated women's swimmer in history, and Jim Thorpe, the first Native American to win an Olympic gold medal for the United States, will be among 19 people to be honored with the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
